# Lunacy

> A collaborative design tool with built-in graphics, offline mode, and private cloud options. Runs on Windows, MacOS, and Linux.


## Docs

- [About Lunacy](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/about.md): Basic information about Lunacy.
- [Auto layout](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/autolayout.md): Learn how to create dynamic designs with auto layout.
- [Basics](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/basics.md): An overview of Lunacy's basic features and capabilities.
- [Cloud documents](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/clouddocs.md): Learn how to work with and collaborate on cloud documents.
- [Comments](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/comments.md): Make notes, provide feedback, and share ideas with your teammates.
- [Components](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/components.md): Increase the speed and productivity of your design workflow with reusable components.
- [Editing shapes](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/editing_shapes.md): Make sure that you know everything about working with shapes in Lunacy.
- [Export](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/export.md): Learn all about Lunacy’s export options and settings.
- [FAQs](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/faq.md): Frequently asked questions about Lunacy.
- [Images](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/images.md): Optimize your work with images in Lunacy.
- [Interface](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/interface.md): Explore the Lunacy interface.
- [Layers](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/layers.md): Learn how to work with different types of layers in Lunacy.
- [Layer and text styles](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/layerstyles.md): Learn how to speed up your work with layer and text styles.
- [Built-in graphics](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/libraries.md): How to make use of our built-in icons, photos, images and UI kits.
- [Linked design](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/linked_design.md): How to update live webpages directly from Lunacy.
- [Private Cloud](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/private_cloud.md): How to collaborate in total privacy.
- [Prototyping](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/prototyping.md): Learn how to create interactive prototypes in Lunacy.
- [Shared libraries](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/sharedlibraries.md): How to reuse components and styles from other files.
- [Shortcuts](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/shortcuts.md): Speed up your workflow with Lunacy's shortcuts.
- [Fills, borders, effects](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/styling.md): Learn how to work with styling options in Lunacy.
- [System requirements](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/sysreq.md): Hardware and software requirements.
- [Teams](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/teams.md): Learn how to organize teamwork.
- [Text](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/text.md): Learn how to work with text in Lunacy.
- [Tips and tricks](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/tips.md): Tips and tricks to help you work in Lunacy faster and more effectively.
- [Tools](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/tools.md): Learn about Lunacy’s design tools.
- [Color variables](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/variables.md): How to create and manage color variables.

## Optional

- [Contacts](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/contact.md): Reach out to us on any of our platforms.
- [Free format](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/free-format.md): Details of the .free format for developers.
- [Localization](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/localization.md): Help us localize Lunacy to your language.
- [Release History](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/release-notes.md): New features and fixes for each version of Lunacy.
- [Legacy Release History](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/rn_before_v10.md): New features and fixes for each version of Lunacy.
- [Plans and pricing](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/subscriptions.md): Find out about our subscriptions.
- [Troubleshooting](https://lunacy.docs.icons8.com/raw/troubleshooting.md): Help Lunacy Support determine the cause of your issue.
